name: Project Thesius: Rick Hanson 2
description:
In Project Thesius: Rick Hanson 2 the player take the role of secret agent Rick Hanson. This time he has to travel to an island where "the enemy" works on the Adventure Weapons System (code name Project Thesius). Hanson's mission is to infiltrate the island and find out more about the project.

This is a classic text adventure: the player enters commands into the parser and then the game gives a response. This is necessary to navigate the environments and solve puzzles, e.g. by combining items or encoding secret messages and codes. There are no graphics.
